name: Circle of Stars
description: Druids who study constellations and draw power from starlight.

2.name: Star Map
2.description: Create a starry focus that grants the guidance cantrip and prepared guiding bolt, plus free uses equal to proficiency bonus.

2.name: Starry Form
2.description: Expend Wild Shape to take on a luminous form, choosing Archer, Chalice or Dragon benefits for 10 minutes.

6.name: Cosmic Omen
6.description: After a long rest, roll to gain Weal or Woe and use reactions a number of times equal to proficiency bonus to add or subtract a d6.

10.name: Twinkling Constellations
10.description: Starry Form benefits improve; Archer and Chalice deal 2d8 and Dragon grants 20-foot flying and hovering.

14.name: Full of Stars
14.description: While in Starry Form, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.
